name: 冬優子
text: おはようございまーす！
trans: Good morning!

name: 冬優子
text: ……って、誰もいないのね
trans: Looks like no one else is around.

name: あさひ
text: おはよっす！
trans: Good morning!

name: 冬優子
text:
わっ！
もう、びっくりした～
trans:
Ah!
Come on, that startled Fuyu.

name: あさひ
text: あ、冬優子ちゃん、お疲れっす！
trans: Oh, Fuyuko-chan, hello!

name: 冬優子
text: うん、お疲れ様～
trans: Yes, hello to you too.

name: あさひ
text: じー
trans: *stares*

name: 冬優子
text: ？　どうしたの、あさひちゃん？
trans: Is something bothering you, Asahi-chan?

name: あさひ
text: それ！
trans: That one!

name: 冬優子
text: それって……？
trans: That one?

name: あさひ
text: もっと近くで見たいっす～！
trans: I want to have a closer look!

name: 冬優子
text: え、な、なになに！？
trans: Huh!?! W-Wh-What are you talking about?

name: 冬優子
text: あ、いや、なんでもないよっ♡
trans: Oh, no, it's nothing.

name: 冬優子
text:
これね、友達にもらったんだ！
なんか、アニメのやつみたいで……
trans:
Oh this, a friend gave it to me!
It seems that this is from an anime.

name: あさひ
text:
へぇ～！
すごそうっすね！　なんか
trans:
Ooh!
That sounds kinda amazing!

name: 冬優子
text:
うん！
えへへ、可愛いよね～
trans:
Yes!
Ehehe  Isn't it cute?

name: あさひ
text: どんなアニメなんすか！　もっと知りたいっす！
trans: What kind of anime is it! I want to know more about it!

name: 冬優子
text:
あ、あー……
ふゆはよくわかんないんだけどね……
trans:
W-Well...
Fuyu doesn't really know much about it...

name: 冬優子
text:
えっと、アイドルの女の子たちが出てくる……
魔法のある世界の物語でね……
trans:
Umm, there are idols girls in it.
And its story is in a world with magic.

name: 冬優子
text:
みんな可愛くて……キラキラで……
でも、すっごくかっこいいんだ……
trans:
All of them are cute... and dazzling...
But, they are really cool...

name: 冬優子
text:
……って、ふゆは全然わかんなくって、
友達に聞いた話なんだけどね、えへへっ
trans:
Fuyu doesn't really know much.
That's what Fuyu's been told by her friend.  Ehehe

name: あさひ
text:
へぇ～、なんだか今すぐにでも
見たくなったっす！
trans: Ooh, I kinda want to watch that right away!

name: 冬優子
trans: Eh?

name: あさひ
text:
どんな子たちがでてくるんすか！？
それに、アイドルと魔法がどう関係してくるんすか！？
trans:
What kind of girls do show up?
Also, what's the relation of the idols with magic?

name: あさひ
text: あとあと──
trans: And also---

name: 冬優子
text:
い、いっぱい聞かれると
ふゆ、混乱しちゃうよ～
trans: I-If you ask a lot of questions all of a sudden, Fuyu's going to get confused.

name: 冬優子
text: そんな気になるなら……アニメ、見てみたら？
trans: If you're really that interested... how about watching the anime itself?

name: あさひ
text: 今日、帰ったら見てみるっす！
trans: I'm going to watch it once I get home today!

name: あさひ
text: 全部見尽くすっすよ～！
trans: I'm gonna watch them all!
